entity.name: Melania Trump
entity.description: Former US First Lady Melania Trump

text:
@FLOTUS @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Trump wants his name on the front of the stimulus checks, so that we’ll know of his attempt to buy our silence about the death of Americans.
$1200 / 75000 Coronavirus deaths, works out to less than 2 cents per death payout. That’s a real bargain Mr. President.
